data.name: Dairy Farm Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Dairy Farm Simulator is a 2D clicker simulator game that is like no other. This game allows you to build a virtual dairy farm. Everything in this game has been researched in great detailed to make sure it is realistic as possible.

Game Features

  • Difficulty System.
  • Help System.
  • 5 Realistic Dairy Cow Breads.
  • Herringbone / rotary milking sheds
  • Shop to purchase: Cattle, Vehicles, Feed, Equipment, Land

Game Features To Be Worked On During Early Access

  • Difficulty System - (Expanded Upon)
  • Help System. - (Expanded Upon)
  • 5 Realistic Dairy Cow Breads. - (Expanded Upon)
  • Breeding - Natural & Artificial.
  • Herringbone / rotary milking sheds - (Expanded Upon)
  • Shop to purchase: Cattle, Vehicles, Feed, Equipment, Land - (Expanded Upon)
  • Fluctuation market pricing system.
  • Tax System.
  • Events System - Power cuts, Floods, Droughts, Snowing
  • Weather System
  • Grass growing mechanics. (Our Own Propriety System)
  • Region Selection
  • Real Milk Solids mechanics. (Our Own Propriety System)
  • In game statistics.
  • Farmer University / XP Points
  • AI Dairy Farm Players.
  • Dairy Company / Companies
  • Staff Management.
  • Farm Automation.
  • ........ Much More.

data.short_description: A 2D clicker simulation game that is like no other which allows you to create a realistic virtual dairy farm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 Screen Resolution Required
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: TBC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 Screen Resolution Required
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: TBC
